Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the amount of paperwork that will be created by Obamacare, stating that it will annually absorb 190 million hours or more.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the statement that Obamacare will result in 190 million hours of paperwork.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the amount of paperwork created by Obamacare can be equated to the construction of Mount Rushmore 1,547 times, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or factors that contribute to the amount of paperwork created by Obamacare, which are not addressed in the claim.
